string.text: Has llegado al tutorial {TUTORIAL_SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Para explorar la ubicación, puede entrar al asentamiento presionando el botón resaltado a la izquierda.
Puede filtrar los elementos a través de botones de la parte superior. Fíltralos a Varios.
!Tienes una misión activa! Puede obtener más información sobre ella haciendo clic en el registro de misiones en la parte inferior izquierda de su pantalla.
You should purchase supplies from the settlement menu on the left.
Your brother recommends that you purchase 2 sacks of grain.{newline}{newline}You can do this by transferring them to your inventory with the little arrow on the left side
Notables help you recruit more and better (higher level) troops according to your relation with them.{newline}{newline}Click on some troops to move them into your party.
To leave a mission, you can hold down the "Tab" key.{newline}{newline}This will return you to the settlement menu where you can purchase supplies and hire recruits.

Welcome to Calradia!{newline}{newline}You can explore the world map by moving the camera with WASD, panning your view by right clicking and dragging your mouse and zooming in and out with the mouse wheel.{newline}{newline}Give it a try.
At the beginning of a battle your soldiers will be holding their position. You can tell them to charge by opening the movement orders with "F1" and choosing "Follow Me" with "F2".
You can move your character:{newline}- Forwards with [W]{newline}- Backwards with [S]{newline}- Left with [A]{newline}- Right with [D]{newline}{newline}Try them all now!
Finish the track and hit targets as many as you can ({HIT} / {ALL}))
To leave a mission, you can hold down the Tab key.{newline}{newline}This will return you to the settlement menu where you can purchase supplies and hire recruits.
The menu on the top right shows the important people in your current location.{newline}{newline}Click on the headman's portrait to talk to him.

Moving your party is done by clicking on the map. This will leave a mark on the target location - unless you have clicked on inaccessible areas such as mountains or sea.{newline}{newline}Let’s set off to {TUTORIAL_SETTLEMENT_NAME}!
You can tell your men to charge by opening the movement orders with "F1" and choosing charge with "F3".
You can hold "Left Alt" key to see the location of the Headman.{newline}{newline}Once you are near him, press F to speak with him.

Después de una batalla muy reñida, es posible que tengas la opción de tomar algunos prisioneros o reclutar a los que has liberado de tu enemigo.{newline}{newline}Ambas opciones se realizan transfiriendo las tropas a tu grupo con el pequeño de la flecha de la izquierda.

Tu hermano te ha pedido que contrates al menos 4 hombres antes de salir a enfrentarte a los asaltantes.{newline}{newline}You can hire troops from villages and towns by clicking on the "Reclutar Tropas" button.
Hideout missions begin with the enemy unaware of your approach.{newline}{newline}Order your troops to follow you with the "F1" and "F2" shortcuts and try to take them on in small groups.
Click on the "Talk" button to return to the notable and learn more about the task ahead.
